about.title: About Lago Bravo
about.description: A premier integrated luxury resort destination featuring the world's largest Crystal Lagoons, offering world-class entertainment, exclusive nightlife, and unparalleled hospitality across stunning global locations.

lagoons.title: Crystal Lagoons Technology
lagoons.description: Experience the world's largest man-made crystal clear lagoons with pristine turquoise waters and white sand beaches.

resort.title: Integrated Resort Destination
resort.description: A complete luxury experience featuring hotels, villas, casino, dining, and entertainment in one spectacular location.

porcelanosa.title: PORCELANOSA Finishes
porcelanosa.description: All interior finishes and kitchen furniture crafted by PORCELANOSA PARTNERS, ensuring the highest quality luxury.

experiences.title: Discover Our Experiences
experiences.subtitle: Explore the finest offerings in luxury hospitality, entertainment, and lifestyle

hotels.title: Luxury Hotels
hotels.description: 5-star palace, Vegas casino resort & Tulum cabanas

marina.title: Exclusive Marina
marina.description: Private yacht club and Full Moon experiences

golf.title: Championship Golf Course
golf.subtitle: Experience world-class golf at our signature 18-hole championship course, featuring breathtaking ocean views and meticulously maintained fairways designed for players of all skill levels.
golf.heroSubtitle: Designed by Tom Doak • Par 72 • 7,200 yards

championship.title: Championship 18-Hole Course
championship.description: Designed by renowned golf architect Tom Doak, featuring stunning ocean views and challenging play for all skill levels.

instruction.title: PGA Professional Instruction
instruction.description: Private lessons and group clinics with certified PGA professionals to improve your game.

practice.title: Premium Practice Facilities
practice.description: Driving range, putting greens, and short game area with top-tier equipment and amenities.

clubhouse.title: Exclusive Clubhouse
clubhouse.description: Luxury clubhouse with pro shop, fine dining, and panoramic course views.

master.name: Golf Master Experience
features: Private golf lesson with PGA pro

info.title: Course Information
info.hoursValue: Sunrise to Sunset, 7 days a week
info.reservationsValue: Book up to 30 days in advance
info.dressCodeValue: Golf attire required, soft spikes only

cta.title: Ready to Tee Off?
cta.description: Book your golf experience at Lago Bravo's championship course and discover why Golf Digest rated us among the world's finest resort courses.

marina.title: Exclusive Marina & Yacht Club
marina.subtitle: Experience luxury on the water with our private marina featuring yacht charters, waterside dining, and our signature Full Moon Gatherings - monthly celebrations under the stars.
marina.heroSubtitle: Exclusive waterfront luxury • Full Moon celebrations

fullMoon.title: Full Moon Gatherings
fullMoon.description: Exclusive monthly boat gatherings under the full moon with live music, premium dining, and celestial views.

yachtCharter.title: Private Yacht Charters
yachtCharter.description: Luxury yacht rentals with professional crew for day trips, sunset cruises, and multi-day adventures.

dining.title: Waterfront Dining
dining.description: Exclusive marina restaurant with fresh seafood, craft cocktails, and panoramic ocean views.

waterSports.title: Water Sports Center
waterSports.description: Complete water sports facility with jet skis, kayaks, paddleboards, and diving equipment.

fullMoonSection.title: Full Moon Boat Gatherings
fullMoonSection.description: Join our exclusive monthly celebration under the full moon. Each gathering features luxury boat transportation, gourmet dining, live music, and the magic of moonlight reflecting on the water.
fullMoonSection.schedule: Full year 2027 schedule available • Monthly celebrations throughout the year

docking.title: Premium Docking
docking.description: 50 luxury boat slips with full utilities

fuel.title: Fuel & Maintenance
fuel.description: Full-service fuel dock and repair facility

concierge.title: Concierge Services
concierge.description: Boat cleaning, provisioning, and trip planning

cta.title: Set Sail in Luxury
cta.description: Experience the ultimate in waterfront luxury at our exclusive marina. From yacht charters to our magical Full Moon Gatherings, create unforgettable memories on the water.

residences.title: Exclusive Resort Residences
residences.subtitle: Architecturally inspired multi-level overwater villas and lagoon-edge residences, featuring innovative designs built directly in and around our pristine crystal lagoon with fractional ownership opportunities.
residences.villaSubtitle: Multi-level designs built directly in crystal lagoon waters with exclusive marina access

lagoon.title: Built in Crystal Lagoon
lagoon.description: Exclusive overwater villas constructed directly in the crystal-clear lagoon waters.

yacht.title: Private Yacht Docking
yacht.description: Each villa includes dedicated boat slip and direct marina access for your vessels.

concierge.title: Concierge Services
concierge.description: 24/7 dedicated concierge team for all villa and condominium residents.

amenities.title: Resort Amenities
amenities.description: Full access to all resort facilities including golf, spa, dining, and marina.

features: Multi-level overwater design built in lagoon
Ground level: Open-plan living, dining & kitchen (55m²)
First level: Master suite + 2 guest bedrooms
Basement level: Entertainment room & wine storage
Glass floor sections for underwater viewing
Private floating dock with lagoon access
Positioned at lagoon's edge with water access
Ground floor: Living area with covered terrace (50m²)
Upper level: Bedrooms with lagoon-view balconies
Private garden plot extending to lagoon

conciergeSection.title: Exclusive Concierge Services
conciergeSection.description: Every villa and condominium owner enjoys 24/7 dedicated concierge service, ensuring every aspect of resort living exceeds your expectations.

investment.title: Investment Opportunity
investment.description: Lago Bravo Integrated Resorts offers exceptional investment potential in one of the world's most desirable luxury resort destinations.
benefits: Optional rental program with guaranteed returns

cta.title: Own Paradise
cta.description: Discover the ultimate in luxury resort living with our exclusive crystal lagoon villas and condominiums. Schedule a private viewing and experience the Lago Bravo lifestyle.

luxury.title: Luxury Resort Living
luxury.description: Experience the ultimate in integrated resort lifestyle

marina.title: Exclusive Marina Access
marina.description: Private yacht docking and luxury waterfront living

accommodations.title: Luxury Accommodations
accommodations.subtitle: Choose from our collection of world-class hotels and exclusive villas, each offering unique experiences and unparalleled luxury.

wedding.name: Wedding Hotel
wedding.subtitle: Luxury Wedding Venue
wedding.description: Elegant accommodations designed specifically for weddings and romantic getaways, featuring exquisite ballrooms and ceremony spaces.

cabana.name: Cabana Village
cabana.subtitle: Tropical Paradise
cabana.description: Intimate cabana-style accommodations nestled in lush tropical gardens, perfect for a private retreat.

centerParc.name: Center Parc
centerParc.subtitle: Business & Conference
centerParc.description: Modern business hotel with state-of-the-art conference facilities and executive amenities.

weddings.title: Lago Bravo Wedding Center
weddings.subtitle: The ultimate destination for luxury weddings and exclusive celebrations. Our dedicated wedding center offers personalized planning services, exquisite venues, and unforgettable experiences.

planning.title: Luxury Wedding Planning
planning.description: Complete wedding planning services with dedicated coordinators

services.title: Additional Services
services.description: Extra services to enhance your wedding experience

cta.title: Start Planning Your Dream Wedding
cta.description: Contact our wedding specialists for a personalized consultation

casino.title: Sophisticated Casino
casino.subtitle: Sophisticated gaming experience with VIP lounges and professional dealers.

tableGames.title: Table Games
tableGames.description: Classic games including Blackjack, Poker, Roulette, and Baccarat with professional dealers.

slots.title: Slot Machines
slots.description: State-of-the-art slot machines featuring the latest games and progressive jackpots.

vip.title: VIP Lounges
vip.description: Exclusive high-limit gaming areas with private dealers and premium amenities.

responsible.title: Responsible Gaming
responsible.description: Committed to providing a safe and responsible gaming environment for all guests.

dining.title: Culinary Excellence
dining.subtitle: Collection of fine dining establishments featuring celebrity chefs and international cuisine.

village.title: Restaurant Village
village.tagline: A Culinary Journey Around the World

laPerla.name: La Perla del Mar
laPerla.description: Exquisite Mediterranean cuisine with panoramic sea views and an extensive wine cellar.

tapas.name: Tapas y Más
tapas.description: Authentic Spanish tapas and traditional dishes in a vibrant, welcoming atmosphere.

sunset.name: Sunset Terrace
sunset.description: Contemporary international cuisine served on a stunning terrace overlooking the sunset.

beach.name: Beach Bar Oasis
beach.description: Sophisticated cocktails and fresh sushi with direct beach access and infinity pool views.

bodega.name: La Bodega
bodega.description: Curated wine selection from around the world paired with artisanal cheeses and charcuterie.

grill.name: Grill & Chill
grill.description: Relaxed dining with premium grilled meats, fresh salads, and tropical cocktails.

cta.title: Culinary Reservations
cta.description: Experience exceptional dining with our celebrity chefs and sommelier-selected wines. Reserve your table for an unforgettable culinary journey.

events.title: Sports & Events
events.subtitle: World-class entertainment venue hosting concerts, sports events, and spectacular shows.

jazz.title: International Jazz Festival
jazz.description: World-renowned jazz artists performing under the stars

boxing.title: Championship Boxing Match
boxing.description: Title fight featuring international boxing champions

flamenco.title: Flamenco Spectacular
flamenco.description: Traditional Spanish flamenco with modern interpretations

electronic.title: Electronic Music Festival
electronic.description: Beach club transforms into electronic music paradise

tennis.title: Tennis Exhibition Match
tennis.description: Former world champions in an exclusive exhibition

nightlife.title: Exclusive Nightlife
nightlife.subtitle: Experience the sophisticated nightlife scene at Lago Bravo World Resort, where elegance meets excitement in our exclusive venues and premium entertainment offerings.

vip.name: VIP Lounge

vip.description: Ultra-exclusive nightlife experience with premium service and sophisticated ambiance.

nightclub.name: Sophisticated Nightclub
nightclub.subtitle: Premium Club
nightclub.description: Elegant nightclub featuring world-class DJs and sophisticated interior design.

saturday.title: Saturday Night Fever
saturday.description: The ultimate Saturday night experience with international DJs and premium cocktails.

sunset.title: Sunset Sessions
sunset.description: Sophisticated evening atmosphere with craft cocktails and ambient music.

midnight.title: Midnight Elegance
midnight.description: Exclusive nightclub experience with world-class DJs and VIP bottle service.

djs.title: International DJs
djs.description: World-renowned DJs and live performers creating unforgettable musical experiences.

vip.title: VIP Experience
vip.description: Exclusive VIP areas with bottle service, private tables, and personalized attention.

atmosphere.title: Elegant Atmosphere
atmosphere.description: Sophisticated ambiance with premium design, lighting, and world-class service.
